source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 652,078.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description: Clear your mind and attune yourself with the Heart of Azeroth, increasing your Mana generation rate by 100% and your Leech by 6 for 15 sec.

passive_spell_tooltip.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Mana spent on them, heal you for 116, and increase your Versatility by 13 for 8 sec.

Each time any ally within 40 yds uses an Azerite Essence, gain 5 Intellect and 3 Haste for 20 sec.

The ally who used an Azerite Essence also gains 3 Haste for 20 sec. Only one ally can have this Haste effect at a time.

Unique: Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

15% of your overhealing is stored in The Well of Existence. When you heal a target under 50% health, the Well releases up to 50 of its stored healing into them.

When the Well contains less than 130 healing, it absorbs healing twice as quickly.
Your heals have a chance to grant either 25 Intellect for 10 sec or 104 mana. Chance of receiving mana increases with your missing mana. 20% chance to gain both effects.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 113,169 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 407 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.
Equip: Reduce Sanity loss within the Visions of N'Zoth by 65%.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Intellect by 506 for 15 sec. Requires the Heart of Azeroth. (Requires level 50 or below)
Use: Dispel any effects of N'Zoth's Corruption, and become immune to any further Corruption effects for 6 sec. (3 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
G'Hanir, the Mother Tree
